W2D3 
Student Name: Thi Luong Dinh
Student Id: 985443



(964, 17), (1488, 63), (2240, 24), (3168, 32)

Step 1: Remove every symbol, just keep numbers

964 17 1488 63 2240 24 3168 32

Step 2: Apply d-gap

964 17 524 63 752 24 928 32

(A) VarInt

964 = 1111000100
17 = 10001
524 = 1000001100
63 = 111111
752 = 1011110000
24 = 11000
928 = 1110100000
32 = 100000

00000111 11000100 10010001 00000100 10001100 10111111 00000101 11110000 10011000 00000111 10100000 10100000

(B) Simple 9

Number:        964	17	524	63	752	24	928	32
Number of bit:	10	5	10	6	10	5	10	6	

0111 00001111000100 00000000010001	
0111 00001000001100	00000000111111	
0111 00001011110000 00000000011000
0111 00001110100000 00000000100000

(C) Bit Aligned

964 - 512 (2^9) = 452 = 1110001002
17 - 16 (2^4) = 1 = 1
524 - 512 (2^9) = 12 = 1100
63 - 32 (2^5) = 31 = 11111
752 - 512 (2^9) = 240 = 11110000
24 - 16 (2^4) = 8 = 1000
928 - 512 (2^9) = 416 = 110100000
32 - 32 (2^5) = 0 = 0

111111111 0 111000100 1111 0 0001 11111111 0 000001100 11111 0 11111 111111111 0 011110000 1111 0 1000 111111111 0 110100000 11111 0 00000
